sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-single-alert', templateUrl: './single-alert.component.html', styleUrls: ['./single-alert.component.css'] }) export class SingleAlertComponent implements OnInit{ public alert: any = {}; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private route: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.route.params.subscribe(params => { const id = params['id']; this.http.get(`http://localhost:8080/alert/${id}`).subscribe( res => this.alert = res, err => console.log('Error: ', err) ) }) } }

AWARIA NR {{ alert.id }}

ADRES IP URZĄDZENIA

{{ alert.boxIp }}

STATUS

{{ alert.status }}

OPIS AWARII

{{ alert.description }}

PRIORYTET

{{ alert.severity }}

DATA POWSTANIA AWARII

{{ alert.timestamp }}
